about-me.title: About me
about-me.text:
Hey there, I’m Pascal. I’ve always been passionate about working with computers — especially anything IT-related. For me, technology is not just a tool, but a creative playground where I can build things from scratch and bring my ideas to life. I’m especially driven by challenges. Every problem is a puzzle I enjoy solving — it motivates me to keep learning, growing, and finding smarter, more elegant solutions.

Let’s connect and create something awesome together!

skill-set.text: I’ve completed several projects, strengthening my frontend skills with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I write clean code in Angular and TypeScript. Working with APIs and Git is part of my daily workflow to manage projects efficiently.
